thread.title: Trump again hits back at question of mental fitness

title: Trump again hits back at question of mental fitness
text:
Trump again hits back at question of mental fitness 6:52pm GMT - 01:34 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday again attacked a new book suggesting he lacks the fitness and stability for office, declaring, ''Ronald Reagan had the same problem and handled it well. So will I.'' ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday again attacked a new book suggesting he lacks the fitness and stability for office, declaring, "Ronald Reagan had the same problem and handled it well. So will I."
